{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Tenda |model=Mesh3 |revision=s |fcc_date=01/24/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |type=range extender, mesh node |fcc_id=V7TMESH3S, V7TA18 |ic_id=9034A-MESH3S |pcb_id=10034059 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.3 |pwr_conn=AC (direct) |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |c|cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8197FN |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Realtek |ram1_model=RTL8197FN |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8197FN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8812BRH |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1200 Dual Band WiFi Repeater}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.tendacn.com/en/product/A18.html}} * Web GUI: http://re.tenda.cn "10034059" and "V1.1" is silkscreened on the board. :Chip IDs are illegible. FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/V7TMESH3S V7TMESH3S] is a change in ID request from V7TA18 :of the [[Tenda A18]] and [[Tenda A15]]. They're likely re-branding the device to fit better into :their Tenda Nova Whole Home [[List of Wireless Systems|WiFi System]] line. ===See also=== :[[List of Wireless Systems#Tenda Nova]] *[[Tenda nova MW5 (Mesh5s)|Tenda Mesh5s]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH5S (2018-07-20) *[[Tenda nova MW5 (Mesh5)|Tenda Mesh5]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH5 (2018-07-19) *[[Tenda Mesh3-18 (Nova MW6 2018)|Tenda Mesh3s-18]] - Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH3-18 (2018-05-09) *[[Tenda Mesh3f]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH3F (2018-05-02) *[[Tenda Mesh3s]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH3S (2018-01-24) *[[Tenda Nova MW6 (Mesh3)|Tenda Mesh3]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH3 (2017-08-23) __NOTOC__
